head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CAVALLI, NICHOLAS J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CAVALLI, NICHOLAS J.

block.p: CAVALLI-Nicholas J. Of Yonkers, died on Saturday, June 3, 2000, at age 50. Mr. Cavalli was the Corporate Vice President for Hayward-Baker Corp. Beloved husband of Christine (nee Pluchino) Cavalli (school teacher with Cardinal Spellman H.S.). Devoted father of Erica and Nicholas C. Cavalli. Dear brother of Linda Botticelli of the Bronx. Visiting hours will be at the Whalen & Ball Funeral Home, 168 Park Ave, Yonkers, on Monday and Tuesday, from 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial in Christ the King Church on Wednesday, June 7, at 10 AM. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to either North Yonkers Boys and Girls Club, Regis High School or the Scholarship Fund at Cardinal Spellman High School. www.ObitDetails.com
